thread.title: A Response to Christian Apologists Who Say “Free Will” Explains the Existence of Evil
thread.title_full: A Response to Christian Apologists Who Say “Free Will” Explains the Existence of Evil

author: Hemant Mehta
title: A Response to Christian Apologists Who Say “Free Will” Explains the Existence of Evil
text:
January 4, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
YouTuber Alex J. O’Connor (a.k.a. CosmicSkeptic ) does a nice job pushing back on the idea that evil exists because God gave us free will : 
As one YouTube commenter notes, Christians could always respond to that rebuttal by saying everyone has free will in Heaven, but they would never choose to be evil… but that also assumes only the most perfect of people get into Heaven, which Christians will readily tell us is not the case at all.
